Bash(RULES_LIBRARY="/tmp/hysteria-rules/rules-library.yaml" bash -c '
source scripts/outbound-manager.sh
echo ""=== 调用 view_outbound_rules 函数 ===""
view_outbound_rules
echo """"
echo ""=== 调试解析过程 ===""
in_rules_section=false
echo ""开始解析 YAML 文件：""
while IFS= read -r line; do
    echo ""处理行: \""$line\""""
    if [[ ""$line"" =~ ^rules:[[:space:]]*$ ]]; then
        echo ""  → 进入 rules 段""
        in_rules_section=true
        continue
    fi
    
    if [ ""$in_rules_section"" = true ]; then
        if [[ ""$line"" =~ ^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*):[[:space:]]*$ ]]; then
            echo ""  → 遇到顶级键，退出 rules 段""
            break
        fi
        
        if [[ ""$line"" =~ ^[[:space:]]{2}([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]+):[[:space:]]*$ ]]; then
            rule_name=""${BASH_REMATCH[1]}""
            echo ""  → 找到规则: $rule_name""
        fi
    fi
done < ""$RULES_LIBRARY""
')
